Metadata: Clearance of plasma corticosteroids during smoltification of coho salmon, "Oncorhynchus kisutch"

The plasma clearance rate (PCR) of radioactivity after a single intracardial injection of 3H-cortisol was elevated during the spring in yearling coho salmon, "Oncorhynchus kisutch." Graphical analysis suggested a seasonal correlation between PCR and gill Na/K-ATPase activity; an explanation for this is offered.
